verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing:<s%> He shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H413>of<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> be <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the <S%H6879>leper;<s%>

Then shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> for him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> and <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and hyssop: <S%H231><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H6833>birds<s%> be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H2416>running<s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

As <S%H853>for<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird,<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> it, and the <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and the <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> them and the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird<s%> that was <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2416>running<s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and shall <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H7971>loose<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And he that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and shave <S%H1548>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> that he may be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> and after <S%H310>that<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and shall <S%H3427>tarry<s%> <S%H4480>abroad<s%> <S%H2351><s%> out of his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

But it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he shall shave all his hair <S%H1548>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H8181><s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H2206>beard<s%> and his <S%H1354>eyebrows,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair<s%> he shall shave <S%H1548>off:<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> also he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that maketh him <S%H2891>clean<s%> shall <S%H5975>present<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that is to be made <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and those things, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> he <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> him for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> and the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> as the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> is the <S%H3548>priest's,<s%> so is the trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is most <S%H6944>holy:<s%> <S%H6944><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H4480>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> foot: <S%H7272><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H4480>log<s%> <S%H3849><s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> left hand: <S%H8042><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And of the <S%H4480>rest<s%> <S%H3499><s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H3709>hand<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%>

And the <S%H3498>remnant<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>pour<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from his <S%H4480>uncleanness;<s%> <S%H2932><s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering: <S%H5930><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, and he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> be <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and cannot get so <S%H369>much;<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5381><s%> then he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> to be <S%H8573>waved,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, and <S%H259>one<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and a <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil;<s%>

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> he is able to <S%H5381>get;<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and the <S%H259>one<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H4480>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> foot: <S%H7272><s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H3709>palm<s%> of his <S%H3548>own<s%> left hand: <S%H8042><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> with his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H676>finger<s%> some <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the trespass offering: <S%H817><s%>

And the <S%H3498>rest<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H3709>hand<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> such <S%H4480>as<s%> <S%H834><s%> he can <S%H5381>get;<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> he is able to <S%H5381>get,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him that is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of him in <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> able to <S%H5381>get<s%> that which pertaineth to his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> ye be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to you for a <S%H272>possession,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession;<s%>

And he that <S%H834>owneth<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> It <S%H7200>seemeth<s%> to me there is as it were a <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H6437>empty<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> into it to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> made <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the house: <S%H1004><s%>

And he shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with hollow <S%H8258>streaks,<s%> <S%H3422>greenish<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H125>reddish,<s%> which in <S%H4758>sight<s%> are <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7023>wall;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shut <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>look:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they take <S%H2502>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2004><s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is, and they shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H413><s%> the city: <S%H5892><s%>
